metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30524 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in TabStrip in Google Chrome prior to 91.0.4472.77 allowedan attacker who convinced a user to install a malicious extension topotentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
